scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-unit: NODE_ENV=unit nyc --reporter none mocha test/unit/*.test.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-integration: DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=servian DB_HOSTNAME=localhost NODE_ENV=integration ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/integration/*.test.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-e2e: NODE_ENV=e2e DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=servian npx jest --config={} --preset="@qawolf/jest-plugin" --rootDir=.qawolf --testTimeout=60000 --runInBand --forceExit
